message: We're looking to hire/contract a seasoned front-end/JavaScript developer at Lincoln Loop. Experience with backbone/underscore is a big plus. Drop us a line if you're interested, info@lincolnloop.com
...forgot to mention, this is a remote job. Location doesn't matter.
hello; i'm a backend python and frontend js developer (github.com/emyller); could you please tell me more about this?
@eMyller send me an email at info@lincolnloop.com and I can give you all the gory details :)
